    • Constructor Detail

      • CombinationExtensionContext

        public CombinationExtensionContext(org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext context,
                                   JCombContext JCombContext,
                                   InputCombination inputCombination)
        Creates a new CombinationExtensionContext with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        context - The ExtensionContext of the current test.
        JCombContext - The JCombContext of the current test. Has to be initialized for a test class instance.
        inputCombination - The InputCombination that should be used for this test execution.
